refsect1.title: CentOS
refsect1.para: For example, if CentOS project supports CentOS 5, 6 and 7. We will drop CentOS 5 support and support CentOS 6 and 7.

refsect1.title: Debian
refsect1.para: We support stable, testing and unstable.
We will release package once for oldstable when Debian project release new stable. And we will announce that we drop oldstable support.

refsect1.title: Ubuntu
refsect1.para: We will support Ubuntu distribution until EOL.
We will announce on ML that we drop old LTS support when we cannot support any more.
